monster.name: Savage Companion

trait.name: Hit Dice
trait.text: Your Companion has a total number of d8 Hit Dice equal to your Barbarian level. It also gains all the normal benefits of both short and long rests.

trait.name: Primal Bond
trait.text: You add your PB to any ability check or saving throw your Companion makes.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 +PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 +2 + PB piercing damage. On hit, the creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC = 10 + PB) or be grappled. Your Companion can only grapple one target at a time.

action.name: Maul
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 +PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 +2 +PB slashing damage.

monster.description:
This terrifying weapon of evil madness can be activated as an action on your turn, zapping one creature of your choice that you can see within 60 feet of you. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target instantly grows a big, bushy moustache measuring up to twice its body size. The affected creature must then roll a d20. On a 5 or lower, it gains a bonus of +5 to any charisma ability checks it makes while having this facial hair on. The moustache lasts for 24 hours, after which it naturally falls out.
Source: LaserLlama's Barbarian Primal Paths v2.1.1 p. 10 (Homebrew)
